item.title: Loopimation â€” Creating looping animations in P5.js
item.description: Loopimation was a short workshop on building looping geometric animations in P5.js that I conducted at Processing Community Day 2020 in Bengaluru (India) . Talking about historical techniques for animations You can explore some of the example starter P5.js sketches , using the wonderful p5.createLoop library . An example looping animation created in workshop Slides are available on Google Slides : You can also download & print my storyboarding template for planning your animations.
